events.message: I received my order today, but unfortunately the product is damaged. The screen has multiple scratches and it doesn't turn on properly.
The case has been categorized under Product Defect because the customer reported damage and malfunction.
The case has been assigned to support agent Sarah M. for further assistance.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your product. Let's get this resolved for you.
Could you please send us photos of the scratches and any error messages showing on the device? This will help us assess the problem more accurately.
Sure, I have attached several photos showing the scratches on the screen and the device’s display when turned on.
Thank you for the photos. We will send a replacement product immediately and arrange for the damaged item to be picked up at your convenience.
That sounds good, thank you for handling this so quickly. I appreciate the prompt support.
The replacement has been processed and the courier will contact you to collect the faulty unit. Please let us know if there’s anything else.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement product and that everything is working perfectly now.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you for your excellent service!
Glad to hear that your issue is resolved. We are closing the case now. Feel free to contact us anytime.
We have sent a brief satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your case.
